product_name: DIMELuminosity Eye Serum with Cucumber + Peptides
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackOne of DIME’s all-time bestsellers, Luminosity Eye Serum, this potent, clean serum visibly depuffs and reduces the appearance of dark circles for a more youthful, refreshed undereye look.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps reduce the appearance of dark circlesHelps decrease undereye eye puffinessHelps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesKey IngredientsNiacinamide promotes skin firmness and radianceCaffeine helps reduce undereye puffinessSqualane helps lock in moisture to assist in improving the appearance of fine linesFormulated WithoutSulfates: DIME products never contain skin irritating ingredients such as sulfates. Sulfate-free products are gentle on the skin, and can help decrease the chances of an allergic reaction.Parabens: Certain parabens have been linked to hormone disruption. DIME prohibits all parabens, including Ethylparaben, Butylparaben, Isobutylparaben, Isopropylparaben, Methylparaben, and Propylparaben.Fragrance: DIME never uses any form of fragrance, natural or synthetic, in any facial skincare productsPhthalates: Certain phthalates (like Dibutyl Phthalate, aka DBP, or DEHP, and DEP) appear on product labels, but most typically remain unlisted, hiding under the term “fragrance.” Since some phthalates have been linked to hormone disruption, DIME avoids them.Item 2641483How To UseApply in the morning and evening after cleansing your face and after applying facial serums, or moisturizers. Use the applicator to apply a pea-sized amount of serum under both eyes. Gently glide the cooling metal tip along orbital bone. For best results, apply daily.IngredientsWater/Aqua, Organic Aloe Vera Juice, Lycium Barbarum (Goji Berry) Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape Seed) Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Squalane, Camellia Seed Oil, DL-Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Carbomer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Caffeine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Malus Domestica (Apple) Fruit Stem Cell Extract, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Sprout Stem Cell Extract, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate (Vitamin C), Acetyl Tetrapeptide, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Vitamin E Mixed Tocopherols, Sodium Hydroxide.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply in the morning and evening after cleansing your face and after applying facial serums, or moisturizers. Use the applicator to apply a pea-sized amount of serum under both eyes. Gently glide the cooling metal tip along orbital bone. For best results, apply daily.
ingredients: Malus Domestica (Apple) Fruit Stem Cell Extract
Argania Spinosa (Argan) Sprout Stem Cell Extract

reviews.headline: Cooling & hydrating. Not great at de-puffing.
reviews.comments: Bought this on sale. For that reason I'll keep using it -- the ingredients are wonderfully nourishing and the cold application feels wonderful in the morning because of the metal tip. If it were full price I probably would've returned it though. I just don't feel it accomplishes what it claims as far as dark circles and de-puffing, at least in my case. The photos show before, immediately after, and 30 mins after. I didn't see any significant reduction in puffiness. Although there's no magic product that will keep you from looking tired if you're tired, this didn't give me as much of a boost I was looking for to justify the price. The skin did feel soft, luminous, and super moisturized -- good product in that regard.

reviews.headline: Been using this for years, happy Ulta has it now!
reviews.comments: I love this under eye cream. It feels lightweight and refreshing. Some under eye creams feel heavy and sticky but not this one.  It is the perfect addition to my skin care routine. I really love DIME products. Their ingredients are super clean.
